msbt.message: Oh my! The game ended, but you still went to find the treasure?! Well then, I'll take it back now.
Thank you so very much for saving me the trouble of digging it up!Unfortunately you ran out of time, so there's no reward. But perhaps you'll do better next time, .

Why, you're alright! I was ever so worried about you.When you didn't return from our little treasure hunt and then it all went darkI feared the worst.I'm not certain what happened to interrupt us, but let's table the treasure hunt for now, shall we?
